General.Name: Beijing Bohui Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Bohui Science & Technology Co., Ltd operates as an information technology company that focuses on the field of audiovisual big data. The company operates and maintains audiovisual business platforms, which include data collection, storage, and analysis primarily targeting broadcasters, such as IPTV/OTT operators, radio and television network companies, new media broadcast control platforms, Internet video content providers, television stations, and related government departments. It also provides various media content security solutions for monitoring centers of radio and television bureaus; and informatized audiovisual data management services for users in industries, such as broadcasting and television, financial media, education, military, civil air defense, meteorological bureaus, public security, armed police, and other industries, as well as government and enterprises. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Beijing, China.
